name: Eli Lilly and Company
summary: Eli Lilly and Company is a leading American multinational pharmaceutical corporation headquartered in Indianapolis. Founded in 1876, Lilly develops and manufactures a wide range of prescription medicines, including well-known products for diabetes, depression, and obesity. As of June 2025, it is one of the world’s most valuable drug companies, employing 47,000 people worldwide and publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker LLY.
